amendment.description: To protect children and their parents from being coerced into administering a controlled substance in order to attend school, and for other purposes.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 988 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 988 proposed by Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR S5487-5488; text: CR S5487-5488) To protect children and their parents from being coerced into administering a controlled substance in order to attend school, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 988 proposed by Senator Inhofe.
